display_help: The Umbra Beast quickly slashes at its prey causing a minor amount of lethal and negative energy as well as causing the target to bleed for a short amount of time causing a minor amount of lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Melee, Minor DMG(Lethal/Negative), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
display_target_help: You are bleeding from the Umbra Beast's Claw Rake!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
